author: vmassol
msg: * added support for HttpServletRequest.getPathTranslated() (i.e. takes into account the simulated URL)

author: vmassol
msg: * corrected mapping for FilterRedirector (some servlet engine - ex: Orion 1.5.2) will not accept a mapping to itself and need a mapping to a jsp for example - although the jsp do not need to be supplied).
* some Servlet 2.3 API servlet engine are still using getFilterConfig() and setFilterConfig() for filters (ex: Orion 1.5.2). Added these methods for backward compatibility.
* This leads to fully supporting Orion 1.5.2 now !

author: vmassol
msg: updated with newer version of containers

author: vmassol
msg: * WebResponse getText() and getTextAsArray() can now be called several times with the same result
* support for Orion 1.5 is now fully working !

author: vmassol
msg: getText() and getTextAsArray() can now be called several times with the same result
